charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1101_0100_:
Deep in the forest, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
realized someone was having a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1101_0200_:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] headed toward the sounds of battle and found
Leon there.
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_0300_:
Dragapult! Charizard! You’re both
moving brilliantly!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_0400_:
Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I wasn’t
expecting to run into you here!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_0301_0500_:
Are your Pokémon battling
each other?
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_0401_0600_:
I was just doing some special training with
Dragapult and Charizard!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_0402_0800_:
I sure am, mate! So, are you here for some
special training as well?
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_0900_:
Hm. I just remembered—I have an introduction
to make!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_1000_:
This chap here is Dragapult! He’s been battling
with me since my days in back in Galar. He’s one
of my indispensable partners!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_1100_:
Dragapult played a big part in my battles against
Raihan and the other Gym Leaders, and he was a
favorite with the fans as well!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_1600_:
Charizard and Dragapult each have their own
fighting style. They’re not so easy to compare.
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_1700_:
When Charizard enters battle, his overwhelming
power and showy, over-the-top moves always
get the crowd roaring!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_1800_:
Dragapult, on the other hand, is good at using
tricky tactics and his overwhelming speed to toy
with his opponents.
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_1900_:
When Dragapult comes out in a battle, the stadium
goes dead silent...
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_2000_:
Everyone in the crowd concentrates, not wanting
to miss a single move Dragapult makes.
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_2100_:
And then, when Dragapult defeats an opponent,
a murmur goes through the crowd...and then the
cheers break out! I just love that moment!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_2200_: So, to get back to your question...
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_2300_:
Dragapult and Charizard are both strong, and
they’re both popular!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_2400_: And now, it’s my turn to ask a question!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_2500_:
Between Charizard’s battle style—overwhelming
opponents with power...
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_2600_:
and Dragapult’s style—using tricky movements and
playing with opponents...
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_0401_2900_: Haha! Is that so? You’re a Charizard fan, eh?
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_0402_3100_: Haha! Is that so? You’re a Dragapult fan, eh?
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_3200_:
To be a strong Trainer, though, you’ve got to know
all sorts of ways to battle.
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_3300_:
There are times when overpowering opponents is
effective, of course...
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_3400_:
But there are some opponents that won’t work on,
and you should try less risky methods as well.
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_3500_:
By trying out different strategies, you’ll naturally
learn how best to battle AGAINST those strategies!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_3600_:
With that in mind, you and me are gonna have
a Pokémon battle—right now! Better to learn by
DOING than by listening to me go on about it!
charaepi_ch0247_80_dande/2301_1201_3700_: All right! I’m sending out Dragapult first!
